#summary status of the various elements of the SDK

==Version 0.1.0==
===IVEF Library===
  * Qt bindings (C++)   
  * Cocoa bindings (Objective-C) 
  * Java bindings

Released and compiles on Windows, Linux and Mac OS X.  Click on Source and follow the instructions to use SVN and obtain the source. 

===Examples===
To demonstrate the capability of the library, several examples has been released which demonstrates the core capabilities.
